mean_cn: adj. 法定的，法令的，可依法惩处的
mean_en: of or relating to formal laws or statutes
word_etyma: sta 站，立 + tut 监护，看管 + ory 与...有关的 → adj. 法定的；法令的；可依法惩处的
short_phrase: make profits while meeting one's statutory obligations
sentence: Our company needs not only to make profits, but also to meet its statutory obligations.
sentence_trans: 我们公司不仅需要获取商业利益，而且也要履行法定责任。
